DYSTOPIA GUIDE BOOK

Font style: Adam Warren Pro, Segoe Script, Myriad Pro

Version: 15.51, armour piercing

Story Summary and Timeline

Dystopia mythos is an afro fantasy, mythological and historical graphic novel about a group of young men's roles in uniting the 3 torn colonies of a former republic into one.

Timeline

  • 1015 - New Dictator enters.
  • 1027 - Constitution scrapped, declaration of state of war.
  • 1032 - Aarin Born, Rift broken.
  • 1035 - War starts.
  • 1036 - B.O.P.E created, Osas joins.
  • 1038 - Amina dies, Aarin 6 yr old.
  • 1040 - War ends, Aarin * years
  • 1045 - Age 13, Joins B.O.P.E
  • 1053 - now. Aarin 21 years old

Powers and Characters

  • Veve: A contract made with a deity for power in exchange of a piece of one's soul. Open use of Veves are illegal as a result of the Null Endemic.
  • Sacrifice: A spell that transacts your entire soul.
  • Nulls: Untouchables who feed off life itself, soul-less.
  • The Black Hands: Shadowy creatures born from the void. Their language "Black Speech" paralyzes mortals.
  • Hybreeds: Crossbreed of human/animal, outlawed after B.O.P.E was created.
  • The Worlogog: Failed wolf hybreed with telekinetic abilities; helped assassinate Aarin's mom.
  • Nmoru: Simplified black magic into contracts, worshiped as a hero after death.
  • Aarin: Neo-sud teen, genius soldier, nicknamed "weakest Eternal", linked to Ogun, calculating fighter.
  • Uncle Osas: Father figure to Aarin, gifted with Divination, trained Aarin.
  • Amina: Top official of the old regime, mother of Aarin.
  • Captain Eye: Immortal, veve to Ala (Mother Earth), reckless fighter, corrupt politician, 10th Eternal.
  • The dead Dictator: Second to form deity contract, caused civil war and rift between realms.
  • Worlogog: Panther/man hybreed.
  • Rasaak: Kaabu prince turned drone, tactician.
  • Yoma: Friend of Aarin, veve to Aganju, corny joker.
  • Veronica Osaro: Popular crime-watch TV presenter.
  • Dr Malcom Eni: Bithra revolution activist.
  • Wofai: Call girl, veve to Esu, key to closing rift.
  • Drones: Cyborg hive-mind soldiers.
  • MRO: Weapons research conglomerate, black magic and genetics research.
  • Fishermen Ninja Tribe: River tribe, fight like ninjas with strawhats.
  • Ayana: Name means "Beautiful".
  • Dr Silvana: MRO researcher, Kaabu traitor, secret deity.
  • The Ukwani Bandits: Poor bandits living in the deserts.
  • Black Speech: Language of the void, petrifies mortals.
  • B.O.P.E: Brotherhood of Powerful Eternals, advocates for contractual magic.
  • The Kaabu Empire: Empire with god-killing tech.
  • The Kaabu Religion: Natural philosophy, opposes immortality and veves.
  • Dr Sylvanus: Founder of Kaabu religion, disguised as MRO researcher.

Deities

  • Oba: Marriage and domesticity
  • Babaluaye: Illness and healing
  • Ibeji: Youth and vitality
  • Oko: Agriculture
  • Olokun: Deep ocean
  • Osumare: Same sex love
  • Ala: Mother Earth
  • Ogun: Blacksmith, technology
  • Aganju: Volcano and desert
  • Anyanwu: Sun
  • Sango: Lightning
  • Esu: Crossroads, trickster
  • Osayin: Forest
  • Oya: Wind
  • Orunmila: Wisdom, foresight
  • Osun: Love, beauty, rivers
  • Obatala: Justice, Supreme God's second child

Themes to Explore

  • Science vs Religion
  • Man vs the Divine
  • The Origin of Evil
  • Capitalism vs Socialism
  • The Passage of Time

Juju

"Juju" is slang for veve contracts and abilities. Juju was outlawed to eliminate the Null scourge. Veves are contracts between mortal and deity, exchanging part of one's soul for powers. Overuse leads to madness, vegetative state, or becoming a Blackhand.

Veves

Veves are forged by mutual agreement between deity and mortal. A God Stone is used to summon a deity and initiate the contract. Once used, the stone crumbles. Veves can boost abilities but consume life force.

Deity Strength Classes

  • God type: Supreme beings
  • Ancient type: Titans, primordial gods
  • Demi-God type: Half gods
  • Monster type: Beasts, vampires, wraiths
  • Hero-Class: Mortal heroes

Elements

  • Light
  • Air
  • Fire
  • Water
  • Dark
  • Mystics

Life Energy (Ori)

"Your life energy, also known as your life force is the feeling of life that is generated by your Ori (your spirit). The more of it you have, the happier you feel and vice versa." — Professor Silvana, Ph.D Contractual Magic Studies

Life force is a blend of body, mind, and identity. Overuse of veves depletes one's soul and risks becoming a Null. Use of a veve requires investing a portion of Ori into it.

Map

  • North — Kaabu
  • West — Ajuran
  • South — Neo-sud
  • East — Bithra
